segment.source: Provides guidelines for manufacturing Windows devices.
segment.target: Provides guidelines for manufacturing Windows devices.

segment.target: Manufacture

segment.source: Purpose
segment.target: Purpose

segment.source: Use the manufacturing tools to deploy your Windows customizations to new Windows 10 devices.
segment.target: Use the manufacturing tools to deploy your Windows customizations to new Windows 10 devices.

segment.source: Learn how to:
segment.target: Learn how to:

segment.source: Combine your customizations, plus languages, drivers, apps and more, into new Windows images.
segment.target: Combine your customizations, plus languages, drivers, apps and more, into new Windows images.

segment.source: Modify these images either from a manufacturing mode for a familiar Windows experience, or from a command line for quicker changes that can be automated and scripted.
segment.target: Modify these images either from a manufacturing mode for a familiar Windows experience, or from a command line for quicker changes that can be automated and scripted.

segment.source: Install images onto new devices.
segment.target: Install images onto new devices.

segment.source: Choose whether to use compression to balance disk space verses device performance.
segment.target: Choose whether to use compression to balance disk space verses device performance.

segment.source: Use flashing tools to speed up the final manufacturing processes
segment.target: Use flashing tools to speed up the final manufacturing processes

segment.source: Capture your customizations into the recovery tools, helping your customers get back up to speed quickly.
segment.target: Capture your customizations into the recovery tools, helping your customers get back up to speed quickly.

segment.source: Description

segment.source: OEM deployment of Windows 10 for desktop editions
segment.target: OEM deployment of Windows 10 for desktop editions

segment.source: This guide is intended for OEMs, and applies to Windows 10 for desktop editions (Home, Pro, Enterprise, and Education).
segment.target: This guide is intended for OEMs, and applies to Windows 10 for desktop editions (Home, Pro, Enterprise, and Education).

segment.source: IT professionals using this guide should have prior knowledge of Windows basic administration and troubleshooting.
segment.target: IT professionals using this guide should have prior knowledge of Windows basic administration and troubleshooting.

segment.source: System builder deployment of Windows 10 for desktop editions
segment.target: System builder deployment of Windows 10 for desktop editions

segment.source: Learn how to deploy Windows 10 desktop, including online and offline customizations, and optional steps for specific scenarios.
segment.target: Learn how to deploy Windows 10 desktop, including online and offline customizations, and optional steps for specific scenarios.

segment.source: This guide is intended to help system builders with both 64-bit and 32-bit configurations.
segment.target: This guide is intended to help system builders with both 64-bit and 32-bit configurations.

segment.target: OEM Windows Desktop Deployment and Imaging Lab

segment.source: This walkthrough shows two ways of creating custom images with languages, apps, and drivers, and modifying them when new designs become available.
